Hero.subtitle: The all-in-one platform to manage tasks, audits, training, and campaigns across every store.

Problem.title: Managing 10 stores shouldn't feel like managing
Problem.subtitle: Sound familiar? You're not alone. Retail ops teams everywhere face the same challenges.
Problem.pain1Desc: Spreadsheets, WhatsApp groups, and email chains don't scale. Information gets lost between systems.
Problem.pain2Desc: You have no idea what's happening at store #7 right now. Compliance is a guess, not a metric.
Problem.pain3Desc: You spend hours chasing updates. Did the display go up? Was the training completed? Nobody knows.

Features.title: One platform, nine powerful modules
Features.subtitle: Replace scattered tools with a single source of truth for your entire retail operation.
Features.feature1Desc: Create, assign, and track tasks across all stores with deadlines and priority levels.
Features.feature2Desc: Standardize operations with reusable checklists and step-by-step procedures.
Features.feature3Desc: Run scheduled or ad-hoc audits with photo evidence and scoring.
Features.feature4Desc: Roll out marketing campaigns across stores and track execution in real time.
Features.feature5Desc: Deliver training content, track completions, and certify your teams.
Features.feature6Desc: Automatically trigger CAPA workflows when audits or inspections fail.
Features.feature7Desc: Motivate teams with points, badges, and store-vs-store leaderboards.
Features.feature8Desc: Share planograms and visual standards, verify compliance with photos.
Features.feature9Desc: Report and resolve issues fast with categorization, assignment, and SLA tracking.

HowItWorks.title: Up and running in three steps
HowItWorks.subtitle: No complex setup. No lengthy onboarding. Get your first store live today.
HowItWorks.step1Title: Set up your stores and teams
HowItWorks.step1Desc: Add your locations, invite your managers and staff. Organize by region, district, or brand. Takes minutes, not days.
HowItWorks.step2Desc: Create recurring tasks, schedule audits, launch campaigns. Everything gets assigned with clear owners and deadlines.
HowItWorks.step3Desc: See what's done, what's overdue, and who's leading — across every store, from anywhere, on any device.

MobileShowcase.title: Your team works on the floor, not at a desk.
MobileShowcase.subtitle: Plexo's native mobile app puts every task, checklist, and audit in your team's pocket. Offline-capable, photo capture, push notifications — everything field teams need.
MobileShowcase.feature1: Complete tasks and checklists on the go

Pricing.title: Plans built around your operation
Pricing.subtitle: Every retail chain is different. We'll craft a plan that fits your number of stores, team size, and the modules you need.
Pricing.highlight1Desc: Tasks, audits, campaigns, training, checklists, CAPA, gamification, visual merchandising, and issue tracking.
Pricing.highlight2Desc: iOS and Android apps with offline support, push notifications, and photo capture.
Pricing.highlight3Desc: Custom onboarding, integrations, and configuration to match how your stores actually operate.
Pricing.ctaSubtitle: Book a 30-minute demo with our team. We'll walk you through the platform, answer your questions, and put together a personalized proposal for your chain.

FAQ.title: Frequently asked questions
FAQ.q1: How long does it take to get started?
FAQ.a1: Most teams are up and running within a day. Add your stores, invite your team, and start creating tasks and checklists immediately. No complex setup or IT involvement required.
FAQ.a2: Yes. The mobile app works offline and syncs automatically when your team reconnects. Perfect for stores with spotty connectivity or warehouse environments.
FAQ.q3: Can I customize checklists and audit templates?
FAQ.a3: Absolutely. Create unlimited custom checklists, audit forms, and task templates. Add scoring, photo requirements, conditional logic, and more.
FAQ.q4: What kind of support do you offer?
FAQ.a4: Every plan includes a dedicated account manager and personalized onboarding. We work directly with your team to get you set up and ensure long-term success.
FAQ.a5: We build a custom plan based on your number of stores, team size, and the modules you need. Book a demo and we'll put together a personalized proposal — no generic price lists.
FAQ.q6: Can I integrate Plexo with other tools?
FAQ.a6: Yes. Plexo includes API access and webhook support for custom integrations. We're also building native integrations with popular retail and enterprise tools.
FAQ.a7: Book a 30-minute demo with our team. We'll walk you through the platform, answer your questions, and have you up and running shortly after.

FeaturesTasksPage.metaDescription: Create, assign, and track tasks across every store with deadlines, priorities, and real-time progress tracking.
FeaturesTasksPage.title: Assign, track, and complete — across every store.
FeaturesTasksPage.subtitle: Create tasks with deadlines and priorities, assign them to specific stores or teams, and track completion in real time. No more chasing updates.
FeaturesTasksPage.cap1Desc: Assign tasks by urgency with P1, P2, and P3 priority levels so your teams always know what to tackle first.
FeaturesTasksPage.cap2Desc: Set daily, weekly, or monthly task recurrence automatically so routine operations never fall through the cracks.
FeaturesTasksPage.cap3Desc: See completion status across all stores instantly. Get notified when tasks are finished, skipped, or running late.
FeaturesTasksPage.cap4Desc: Require photo proof before marking tasks complete. Build an auditable record of work done across every location.

FeaturesCampaignsPage.metaDescription: Roll out marketing campaigns, seasonal promotions, and merchandising initiatives across all stores — and track execution in real time.
FeaturesCampaignsPage.title: Launch campaigns that actually get executed.
FeaturesCampaignsPage.subtitle: Roll out marketing campaigns, seasonal promotions, and merchandising initiatives across all stores — and track execution in real time.
FeaturesCampaignsPage.cap1Desc: Push campaigns to all stores or target specific regions and locations.
FeaturesCampaignsPage.cap2Desc: Break campaigns into tasks with clear instructions and deadlines.
FeaturesCampaignsPage.cap3Desc: Require stores to upload proof of execution before marking complete.
FeaturesCampaignsPage.cap4Desc: See which stores have executed and which are falling behind instantly.

FeaturesAuditsPage.metaDescription: Run scheduled or surprise audits across every location. Score compliance, capture photo evidence, and trigger corrective actions automatically.
FeaturesAuditsPage.title: Inspect with confidence, act on data.
FeaturesAuditsPage.subtitle: Run scheduled or surprise audits across every location. Score compliance, capture photo evidence, and trigger corrective actions automatically.
FeaturesAuditsPage.cap1Desc: Build scoring templates with sections, weights, and pass/fail criteria tailored to every audit type and department.
FeaturesAuditsPage.cap2Desc: Capture and annotate photos for every finding directly in the app. All evidence is stored alongside the audit record.
FeaturesAuditsPage.cap3Desc: Set recurring audit schedules by store, region, or audit type. Surprise audits can be dispatched instantly to any location.
FeaturesAuditsPage.cap4Desc: Automatically create follow-up tasks when items fail an audit. Assign owners, set deadlines, and track resolution in real time.

FeaturesChecklistsPage.metaDescription: Build reusable checklists and standard operating procedures that ensure consistency across all retail locations. Every step documented, every completion tracked.
FeaturesChecklistsPage.title: Standardize every process, in every store.
FeaturesChecklistsPage.subtitle: Build reusable checklists and standard operating procedures that ensure consistency across all locations. Every step documented, every completion tracked.
FeaturesChecklistsPage.cap1Desc: Build once, deploy to every store. Create templates for any process and roll them out instantly across all locations.
FeaturesChecklistsPage.cap2Desc: Show or hide steps based on previous answers for dynamic checklists that adapt to real-world situations on the floor.
FeaturesChecklistsPage.cap3Desc: Require evidence at critical steps for compliance proof. Attach photos and collect digital signatures directly in the app.
FeaturesChecklistsPage.cap4Desc: Track which stores complete checklists on time and which don't. Spot compliance gaps before they become costly problems.

FeaturesTrainingPage.metaDescription: Deliver bite-sized training content, track completions, and certify your retail workforce — all from the same platform they use every day.
FeaturesTrainingPage.title: Train your teams without pulling them off the floor.
FeaturesTrainingPage.subtitle: Deliver bite-sized training content, track completions, and certify your workforce — all from the same platform they use every day.
FeaturesTrainingPage.cap1Desc: Short, focused lessons that staff can complete between customers.
FeaturesTrainingPage.cap2Desc: Test knowledge retention with auto-graded quizzes after each module.
FeaturesTrainingPage.cap3Desc: Track certifications, set expiry dates, and auto-remind for renewals.
FeaturesTrainingPage.cap4Desc: Assign different training paths to cashiers, managers, and warehouse staff.

FeaturesCorrectiveActionsPage.metaDescription: Automatically turn failed audit items into corrective action plans with owners, deadlines, severity classification, and verification workflows — so nothing slips through the cracks.
FeaturesCorrectiveActionsPage.title: Find it, fix it, prove it — automatically.
FeaturesCorrectiveActionsPage.subtitle: When audits or inspections reveal issues, Plexo automatically creates corrective action plans with owners, deadlines, and follow-up verification.
FeaturesCorrectiveActionsPage.cap1Desc: Failed audit items automatically become corrective actions with full context — store, auditor, and the specific finding — so nothing needs to be manually re-entered.
FeaturesCorrectiveActionsPage.cap2Desc: Categorize issues as Critical, Major, or Minor to surface the right items first. Filters, sorting, and dashboards all reflect severity so your team always knows what demands immediate action.
FeaturesCorrectiveActionsPage.cap3Desc: Document the underlying root cause and the preventive measures taken for every CAPA. Identify recurring patterns across stores before they become systemic problems.
FeaturesCorrectiveActionsPage.cap4Desc: Require photo evidence and manager sign-off before a CAPA can be closed. Every resolution is timestamped and auditable, giving you an unbreakable chain of accountability.

FeaturesGamificationPage.metaDescription: Motivate store teams with points, badges, and leaderboards. Turn compliance into competition and make operational excellence something your teams actually want to achieve.
FeaturesGamificationPage.title: Turn compliance into competition.
FeaturesGamificationPage.subtitle: Motivate store teams with points, badges, and leaderboards. Make operational excellence something your teams actually want to achieve.
FeaturesGamificationPage.cap1Desc: Award points for task completion, audit scores, and training milestones. Every action your team takes contributes to a running score.
FeaturesGamificationPage.cap2Desc: Rank stores against each other to drive healthy competition across regions. Real-time standings keep teams motivated week over week.
FeaturesGamificationPage.cap3Desc: Unlock badges for streaks, perfect scores, and special accomplishments. Recognizable icons that teams wear with pride on their profiles.
FeaturesGamificationPage.cap4Desc: Define your own reward tiers and recognition programs for top performers. Tie point thresholds to real incentives that matter to your teams.

FeaturesVisualMerchandisingPage.metaDescription: Share planograms and visual standards with every store, then verify compliance with photo comparisons. No more guessing if the display went up correctly.
FeaturesVisualMerchandisingPage.title: Every display, exactly as planned.
FeaturesVisualMerchandisingPage.subtitle: Share planograms and visual standards with every store, then verify compliance with photo comparisons. No more guessing if the display went up correctly.
FeaturesVisualMerchandisingPage.cap1Desc: Upload reference images and distribute to stores instantly. Every location sees exactly what the display should look like before they touch a single product.
FeaturesVisualMerchandisingPage.cap2Desc: Side-by-side comparison of reference vs actual store execution. Spot discrepancies at a glance without traveling to the location.
FeaturesVisualMerchandisingPage.cap3Desc: Automated or manual scoring of visual merchandising accuracy. Get a clear percentage match so you know exactly how well each store executed the display.
FeaturesVisualMerchandisingPage.cap4Desc: Set different visual standards for different store formats or regions. A flagship on Fifth Avenue and a suburban strip mall don't need the same planogram.

FeaturesIssueTrackingPage.metaDescription: Give every team member a fast way to report issues. Automatically categorize, assign, and track resolution with full SLA visibility.
FeaturesIssueTrackingPage.title: Report it, route it, resolve it.
FeaturesIssueTrackingPage.subtitle: Give every team member a fast way to report issues. Automatically categorize, assign, and track resolution with full SLA visibility.
FeaturesIssueTrackingPage.cap1Desc: Any team member can report an issue in seconds from their phone.
FeaturesIssueTrackingPage.cap2Desc: Auto-categorize issues by type and route to the right team.
FeaturesIssueTrackingPage.cap3Desc: Set resolution targets by priority and track compliance automatically.
FeaturesIssueTrackingPage.cap4Desc: Auto-escalate unresolved issues to managers after defined thresholds.

CookiesPage.introP1: Plexo Inc. ("we," "us," "our," or "Company") uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website and in our retail operations platform (the "Service"). This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, why we use them, the types of cookies we deploy, and how you can manage your cookie preferences.
CookiesPage.introP2Before: This Cookie Policy should be read in conjunction with our
CookiesPage.section1Para1: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, tablet, mobile phone, or other device) when you visit a website or use an application. Cookies allow websites and applications to:
CookiesPage.section1Item3: Understand how you use the platform
CookiesPage.section1Para2: Some cookies are deleted when you close your browser (session cookies), while others remain on your device for a specified period or indefinitely (persistent cookies).
CookiesPage.section2Sub1Para: These cookies are necessary for the Service to function properly. They enable core features such as:
CookiesPage.section2Sub1Item4: Memory of user preferences and selections
CookiesPage.section2Sub1NoteText: Essential cookies cannot be disabled without impeding the functionality of the Service. They do not require explicit consent as they are technically necessary.
CookiesPage.section2Sub2Para: These cookies help us understand how you use the Plexo platform and website. They collect information about:
CookiesPage.section2Sub2Item1: Pages visited and time spent on each page
CookiesPage.section2Sub2ToolsText: We use Google Analytics and similar analytics services to collect and analyze this data. Your data is typically anonymized and aggregated. You can opt out of analytics tracking through your browser settings.
CookiesPage.section2Sub3Para: These cookies remember your choices and preferences to enhance your experience:
CookiesPage.section2Sub3ParaBottom: These cookies enhance your user experience by reducing the need to re-enter preferences on each visit.
CookiesPage.section2Sub4Para: These cookies track your interaction with our marketing campaigns and advertisements:
CookiesPage.section2Sub4Item1: Tracking campaign performance and conversion rates
CookiesPage.section2Sub4Item2: Displaying targeted advertisements based on interests
CookiesPage.section2Sub4Item3: Retargeting to show relevant ads across platforms
CookiesPage.section2Sub4Item4: Understanding which marketing channels are effective
CookiesPage.section2Sub4NoteText: You can generally opt out of marketing cookies through your browser settings or the "Do Not Track" feature.
CookiesPage.section3Para: In addition to our own cookies, we allow certain third-party service providers to place cookies on your device. These include:
CookiesPage.section3Sub1Item1Text: Tracks website traffic and user behavior.
CookiesPage.section4Para: In addition to cookies, we use similar tracking technologies that serve similar functions:
CookiesPage.section4Sub1Para: Web storage mechanisms that allow websites to store data locally on your device. These are often used for caching and improving performance.
CookiesPage.section4Sub2Para: Small transparent images embedded in emails or pages that track whether a message was opened or a page was viewed.
CookiesPage.section4Sub3Para: Unique identifiers for mobile devices used to recognize your device on return visits and for attribution purposes.
CookiesPage.section4Sub4Para: Code snippets that track user interactions and enable third-party services to function on our platform.
CookiesPage.section5Sub1Para: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through settings. You can typically:
CookiesPage.section5Sub1Item2: Accept only certain types of cookies
CookiesPage.section5Sub1Item4: Receive a warning before a cookie is stored
CookiesPage.section5Sub1ParaLinks: For instructions specific to your browser:
CookiesPage.section5Sub2Para: If your browser supports the "Do Not Track" feature, you can enable it to send signals requesting that websites not track your activity. While Plexo respects these signals where technically feasible, we cannot guarantee that all third-party services honor Do Not Track requests.
CookiesPage.section5Sub3Para: Several organizations provide opt-out tools for tracking:
CookiesPage.section5Sub4Para: Disabling essential cookies may impair the functionality of the Plexo platform and website. You may not be able to log in, maintain your session, or use certain features. We recommend keeping essential cookies enabled while managing marketing and analytics cookies according to your preferences.
CookiesPage.section6Sub1Para: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we require your explicit consent before deploying non-essential cookies. When you visit our website from the EU, you will receive a cookie consent banner allowing you to:
CookiesPage.section6Sub1ParaBottom: You can update your preferences at any time through our cookie management tool.
CookiesPage.section6Sub2ParaBefore: Under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), you have the right to know what personal information is collected, used, and shared. You can exercise these rights through your account settings or by contacting us at
CookiesPage.section6Sub3ParaBefore: Plexo complies with applicable privacy laws in all jurisdictions where we operate. Please refer to our
CookiesPage.section7Para: We take the security of cookie data seriously and implement appropriate safeguards:
CookiesPage.section7Item1: Session cookies are encrypted when transmitted
CookiesPage.section7Item2: Sensitive authentication tokens are marked as secure and httpOnly
CookiesPage.section7Item3: We use secure, encrypted connections (HTTPS) to transmit cookie data
CookiesPage.section7Item4: Cookie data is stored securely on our servers and protected from unauthorized access
CookiesPage.section8Para: Cookie retention periods vary based on type and purpose:
CookiesPage.section8Item1Text: Deleted when you close your browser
CookiesPage.section8Item2Text: Typically retained for the duration of your account or up to 2 years
CookiesPage.section8Item3Text: Typically retained for up to 24 months
CookiesPage.section8Item4Text: Retained until explicitly cleared or after 2 years of inactivity
CookiesPage.section8Item5Text: Retained for up to 12 months or until you opt out
CookiesPage.section9Para1: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our cookie practices, new technologies, legal requirements, or other factors. We will notify you of material changes by:
CookiesPage.section9Item1: Updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this policy

CookiesPage.section9Item3: Sending you an email notification if changes materially affect your privacy
CookiesPage.section9Para2: Your continued use of the Service after updates become effective constitutes your acceptance of the updated Cookie Policy.
